eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.book

Class BookSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.book.BookSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BookPiece

    public class BookSection
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookPiece
    A BookSection is a set of BookCategories tied to a single concept. For example, the Basics sections contains BookCategories on components, the preface, etc.

    Here is an example tree:

    • Tool: BookSection
      • Piece A: BookCategory
        • Upgrade X: BookEntry
          • Description page: BookPage
          • Crafting page: BookPage
        • Upgrade Y: BookEntry
          • Description page: BookPage
          • Crafting page: BookPage
